trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a page of content that can be navigated to and hosted by [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula uma página de conteúdo que pode ser navegado e hospedado por [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"> </xref>, e <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Page encapsulates a page of content that can be navigated, and has the following key members: - **Lifetime Management**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.KeepAlive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Página encapsula uma página de conteúdo que pode ser acessada e tem os seguintes membros de chave:- **gerenciamento de vida útil**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.KeepAlive%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.KeepAlive%2A>

trans-unit.source: - **Navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A>

trans-unit.source: - **Appearance**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Background%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.FontFamily%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.FontSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Foreground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.ShowsNavigationUI%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Template%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Title%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Appearance**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Background%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.FontFamily%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.FontSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Foreground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.ShowsNavigationUI%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Template%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Title%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Title%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Template%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.ShowsNavigationUI%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Foreground%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.FontSize%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.FontFamily%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Content%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Background%2A>

trans-unit.source: - **Host Window Appearance**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Hospedar a aparência da janela**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowWidth%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: A page can be defined by using markup, markup and code-behind, or code.
trans-unit.target: Uma página pode ser definida usando a marcação, marcação e code-behind ou código.

trans-unit.source: A page is the preferred way to package content for navigation, for the following reasons: - It is easy to define, reuse, and manage.
trans-unit.target: Uma página é a melhor maneira de conteúdo do pacote para navegação, pelos seguintes motivos:-é fácil definir, reutilizar e gerenciar.

trans-unit.source: - It can access and use the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> that navigated to it.
trans-unit.target: -Ele pode acessar e usar o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>que navegou para um proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: - It can alter the title, width, height, and navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of its host window (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.ShowsNavigationUI%2A>).
trans-unit.target: -Ele pode alterar o título, largura, altura e navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] de sua janela do host (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.ShowsNavigationUI%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.ShowsNavigationUI%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A>

trans-unit.source: - It has designer support in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: -Tem suporte ao designer no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A page can be hosted from <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, or from a browser.
trans-unit.target: Uma página pode ser hospedada em <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, ou em um navegador.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: To be hosted, a page can be: - The direct child of a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> element in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Para ser armazenado, uma página pode ser:-o filho direto de um <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: - Instantiated and set as the value of the `Content` property of <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: -Instanciados e definido como o valor da `Content` propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: - Set as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] source of the `Source` property of either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: -Definido como o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] origem do `Source` propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: - Set as the <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> in a standalone application.
trans-unit.target: -Definido como o <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>em um aplicativo autônomo.</xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set as the <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: -Definido como o <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>em um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application typically has two or more pages, which can be navigated between using the following mechanisms: - Declaratively by using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo normalmente tem duas ou mais páginas, que podem ser navegadas entre usar os seguintes mecanismos: - declarativamente usando <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>

trans-unit.source: - Programmatically by using <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>.
trans-unit.target: -Programaticamente usando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: - Visually by using the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of the host, including [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: -Visualmente usando a navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] do host, incluindo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: For structured navigation using page functions (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601>), see [Structured Navigation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Navigation Topologies Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Usando funções de página de navegação estruturada (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601>), consulte [visão geral de navegação estruturada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [visão geral de topologias de navegação](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601>

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controle podem ser definidas pelo estilo padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo padrão, a propriedade pode ser alterada de seu valor padrão quando o controle é exibido no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo padrão é determinado pelo qual tema de área de trabalho é usado quando o aplicativo está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [padrão WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Page"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Page"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> is not being kept alive (see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.KeepAlive%2A>), it needs to implement a default constructor to allow [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to create a new instance of it when navigated to in back or forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>não está sendo mantida ativa (consulte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.KeepAlive%2A>), é necessário para implementar um construtor padrão para permitir [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para criar uma nova instância dela quando navegar até em ou encaminhar o histórico de navegação.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.KeepAlive%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>

trans-unit.target: Organiza o conteúdo (elementos filho) o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Page"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: O tamanho a ser usado para organizar os elementos filho.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho organizado da página.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the content of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> hosts a layout element—such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>—that hosts the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>hospeda um elemento de layout, como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>— que hospeda o conteúdo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Page"></xref> instance is retained in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Page"> </xref> instância é mantida no histórico de navegação.

trans-unit.source: When a page is first navigated to, a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> class is created.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma página é primeiro navegou para uma nova instância do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>classe é criada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>

trans-unit.source: When a page is navigated away from (either back or forward), an entry for the page is added to navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma página é acessada de (atrás ou adiante), uma entrada para a página é adicionada ao histórico de navegação.

trans-unit.source: By default, the entry does not reference the page object.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, a entrada não faz referência o objeto de página.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the entry contains a pack [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the page.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, a entrada contém um pacote [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para a página.

trans-unit.source: When the entry for the page is navigated to using navigation history, the pack [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] is used to create a new instance of the page.
trans-unit.target: Quando a entrada para a página é navegada usando o histórico de navegação, o pacote [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] é usado para criar uma nova instância da página.

trans-unit.source: This behavior is the default, to avoid excessive memory use: retaining page instances can quickly consume memory, particularly those with a nontrivial amount of content.
trans-unit.target: Esse comportamento é o padrão, para evitar o uso excessivo de memória: Manter instâncias de página pode consumir rapidamente a memória, especialmente aqueles com um valor não trivial do conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: This problem is augmented by the fact that there is no limit to the number of entries that can be stored in the back and forward stacks of navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Esse problema é aumentado pelo fato de que não há nenhum limite para o número de entradas que podem ser armazenados na parte traseira e pilhas de avanço do histórico de navegação.

trans-unit.source: In contrast, storing pack [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for pages has virtually no impact on memory consumption.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, armazenando o pacote [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] para páginas praticamente não tem impacto no consumo de memória.

trans-unit.source: The main side effect of creating new instances of a page is that page state is not remembered from one instance of a page to another.
trans-unit.target: O efeito principal da criação de novas instâncias de uma página é o estado da página não será lembrado de uma instância de uma página para outra.

trans-unit.source: In these cases, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] offers several techniques for remembering state.
trans-unit.target: Nesses casos, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] oferece várias técnicas para lembrar o estado.

trans-unit.source: To keep a page alive, you set the KeepAlive property to `true` (the default is `false`).
trans-unit.target: Para manter uma página ativa, você definir a propriedade KeepAlive como `true` (o padrão é `false`).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Pages that are instantiated and navigated to using only code (for example, calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>), are automatically kept alive.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Páginas que são instanciadas e navegadas usando somente o código (por exemplo, chamar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>), são mantidas ativas automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should avoid setting KeepAlive to `true` unless you need to: - When a page has a lot of content, it may take a long time to instantiate.
trans-unit.target: Evite definir KeepAlive `true` , a menos que você precisa: - quando uma página tiver muito conteúdo, pode levar muito tempo para criar uma instância.

trans-unit.source: If the page is not kept alive, and the page is frequently navigated to, the cost of constantly instantiating the page may have a negative impact on the user experience.
trans-unit.target: Se a página não é mantida ativa, e a página é navegada frequentemente, o custo de constantemente instanciando a página pode ter um impacto negativo sobre a experiência do usuário.

trans-unit.source: However, from a performance perspective, you should rely on the default settings and profile your application's performance; if testing identifies pages with load times that fall below the range required for your application, configuring the pages to be kept alive may be one way to solve the problem.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, de uma perspectiva de desempenho, você deve contar com as configurações padrão e criar o perfil de desempenho do seu aplicativo; Se o teste identifica páginas com tempos de carregamento que caem abaixo do intervalo necessário para seu aplicativo, configurar as páginas a serem mantidos atividade pode ser uma maneira de resolver o problema.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Entries for pages that are kept alive are not retained in navigation history of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] if a user navigates away from and back to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Entradas para páginas que são mantidas ativas não são mantidas no histórico de navegação de um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] se um usuário navega de e para o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Only journal entries for pages that are not kept alive are retained in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Somente as entradas de diário para páginas que não são mantidas ativas são mantidas no histórico de navegação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the navigation service that the host of the page is using to manage navigation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o serviço de navegação que está usando o host da página para gerenciar a navegação.

trans-unit.source: Pages can be hosted by multiple types of hosts, including <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, and a browser.
trans-unit.target: Páginas podem ser hospedadas por vários tipos de hosts, incluindo <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>e um navegador.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: Pages often need to integrate with their host's navigation to provide in-page navigation support.
trans-unit.target: Páginas muitas vezes é preciso integrar a navegação do seu host para oferecer suporte a navegação da página.

trans-unit.source: However, because a page may not know what its host will be at run time, it cannot integrate directly with its host's navigation members to do so.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, como uma página talvez não saiba o que seu host serão em tempo de execução, não é possível integrar diretamente com membros de navegação do seu host para fazer isso.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it can attempt to use a navigation service, which is a service that supports browser-style navigation and is encapsulated by the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> class.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, ele pode tentar usar um serviço de navegação, que é um serviço que dá suporte à navegação de estilo de navegador e é encapsulado pela <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: You cannot create your own <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> instance, though.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível criar seu próprio <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>instância, embora.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: Instead, host types such as <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, or a browser create their own <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> instance that you can access from the NavigationService property.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, tipos de host, como <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, ou um navegador criar seus próprios <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>instância que você pode acessar a partir da propriedade NavigationService.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: The navigation service that is returned from the NavigationService property is the instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> class that is managed by the first navigator up the visual tree.
trans-unit.target: O serviço de navegação que é retornado da propriedade NavigationService é a instância do <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>classe que é gerenciado pelo navegador primeiro na árvore visual.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: If one is not found, `null` is returned, indicating a page's host does not support navigation.
trans-unit.target: Se não for encontrado, `null` for retornado, indicando que um host de página não oferece suporte a navegação.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Window> class does not support navigation and does not provide a navigation service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Window>classe não oferece suporte a navegação e não fornece um serviço de navegação.</xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"></xref> object that the host of the page is using to manage navigation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the host does not support navigation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"> </xref> do objeto que o host da página está usando para gerenciar a navegação, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o host não dá suporte a navegação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)] is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] de um <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"> </xref> em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)] está visível.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> displays navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] by default to enable browser-style forwards and backwards navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>Exibe a navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] por padrão para habilitar o estilo de navegador para frente e para trás navegação.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: If a page is set as the <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application> automatically opens a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> to host the page in.
trans-unit.target: Se uma página é definida como o <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>abre <xref:System.Windows.Application>automaticamente um <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>para hospedar o in de página.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the page does not want to use the default <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], it can set ShowsNavigationUI to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se a página não desejar usar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], ele pode definir ShowsNavigationUI `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] does not integrate with the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)], it provides its own navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], which can be shown or hidden by setting ShowsNavigationUI.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Porque [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] não se integra com a navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)], ele fornece sua própria navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], que podem ser mostrado ou ocultado definindo ShowsNavigationUI.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] does integrate with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], so setting ShowsNavigationUI on pages in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] has no effect.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]integrar o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], de modo de configuração ShowsNavigationUI em páginas [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] não tem nenhum efeito.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of a host <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] de um host <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"> </xref> estiver visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Title property is not displayed by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>, nor is it displayed from the title bar of the window that is hosting a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A> to change the title of a host window.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, você definir <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A>para alterar o título de uma janela do host.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Title can also be used to generate the name of the navigation history entry for a piece of navigated content.
trans-unit.target: Título também pode ser usado para gerar o nome da entrada de histórico de navegação para uma parte do conteúdo navegado.

trans-unit.source: The following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - The attached <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name%2A> attribute.
trans-unit.target: As seguintes partes dos dados são usadas para criar automaticamente um nome de entrada de histórico de navegação, em ordem de precedência:-o anexo <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name%2A>atributo.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The Title property.
trans-unit.target: -A propriedade de título.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A> property and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A>propriedade e o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para a página atual - o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para a página atual.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you have associated a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object with a piece of content in navigation history, you can specify the name that appears in the navigation history entry by overriding <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se você tiver associado uma <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>objeto com uma parte do conteúdo no histórico de navegação, você pode especificar o nome que aparece na entrada de histórico de navegação, substituindo <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the host <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Page"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura do host <xref href="System.Windows.Window"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"> </xref> de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Page"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: WindowHeight is only applied when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> is hosted directly by a window, which includes: - <xref:System.Windows.Window> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> is hosted by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, setting WindowHeight has no effect, but you can still get the value of WindowHeight.
trans-unit.target: AlturaDaJanela só será aplicado quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>está hospedado diretamente por uma janela, que inclui:- <xref:System.Windows.Window>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>- [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>é hospedado por um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, definir AlturaDaJanela não tem nenhum efeito, mas você ainda pode obter o valor de AlturaDaJanela.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] can only use WindowHeight to change the height of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; the height cannot be changed by setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>em um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] só pode usar AlturaDaJanela para alterar a altura de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; a altura não pode ser alterada definindo <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>

trans-unit.source: The minimum height of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window is 150 pixels.
trans-unit.target: A altura mínima do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] janela é 150 pixels.

trans-unit.source: For browser-hosted pages, this means that the value of WindowHeight may not be applied if it would cause the total height of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window to be less than 150 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Para páginas online, isso significa que o valor de AlturaDaJanela não pode ser aplicado se isso faria com que a altura total do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] janela a ser menos de 150 pixels.

trans-unit.source: The height of a window that directly hosts a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Page"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A altura de uma janela que hospeda diretamente um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Page"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title of the host <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Page"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o título do host <xref href="System.Windows.Window"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"> </xref> de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Page"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: By default, the title of a window that hosts a page, including <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], is the name of the file that is currently being hosted (with an .xaml extension if the page is loose [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], or an .xbap extension if the page is part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o título de uma janela que hospeda uma página, incluindo <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], é o nome do arquivo que está sendo hospedado no momento (com uma extensão. XAML se a página é solta [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], ou uma extensão. xbap se a página for parte de um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: A page can change the default by setting its WindowTitle property.
trans-unit.target: Uma página pode alterar o padrão definindo sua propriedade WindowTitle.

trans-unit.source: Once a page sets the title of a window in this way, the window's title does not change until another page sets WindowTitle with a different value.
trans-unit.target: Depois que uma página define o título de uma janela dessa maneira, título da janela não muda até outra página define WindowTitle com um valor diferente.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> must be the topmost piece of content in a window for WindowTitle to have an effect; if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> is hosted within a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, for example, setting WindowTitle does not change the title of the host window.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>deve ser a parte superior do conteúdo em uma janela para WindowTitle ter efeito; se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>está hospedado em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, por exemplo, definir WindowTitle não altera o título da janela do host.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>

trans-unit.source: WindowTitle can also be used to generate the name of the navigation history entry for a piece of navigated content.
trans-unit.target: WindowTitle também pode ser usado para gerar o nome da entrada de histórico de navegação para uma parte do conteúdo navegado.

trans-unit.source: The following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - The attached <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name%2A> attribute.
trans-unit.target: As seguintes partes dos dados são usadas para criar automaticamente um nome de entrada de histórico de navegação, em ordem de precedência:-o anexo <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name%2A>atributo.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Title%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The WindowTitle property and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page.
trans-unit.target: -A propriedade WindowTitle e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para a página atual - o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para a página atual.

trans-unit.source: If you have associated a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object with a piece of content in navigation history, you can specify the name value of a navigation history element by overriding <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se você tiver associado uma <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>objeto com uma parte do conteúdo no histórico de navegação, você pode especificar o valor do nome de um elemento de histórico de navegação, substituindo <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: The title of a window that directly hosts the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Page"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O título de uma janela que hospeda diretamente o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Page"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: WindowWidth is only applied when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> is hosted directly by a window, which includes: - <xref:System.Windows.Window> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> is hosted by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, setting WindowWidth has no effect, but you can still get the value of WindowWidth.
trans-unit.target: LarguraDaJanela só será aplicado quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>está hospedado diretamente por uma janela, que inclui:- <xref:System.Windows.Window>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>- [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>é hospedado por um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, definir LarguraDaJanela não tem nenhum efeito, mas você ainda pode obter o valor de LarguraDaJanela.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] can only use WindowWidth to change the width of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; the width cannot be changed by setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>.

trans-unit.target: A largura mínima do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] janela é 250 pixels.

trans-unit.source: For browser-hosted pages, this means that the value of WindowWidth may not be applied if it would cause the total width of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window to be less than 250 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Para páginas online, isso significa que o valor de LarguraDaJanela não pode ser aplicado se isso faria com que a largura total do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] janela a ser menos de 250 pixels.
